text.section:
The technical review committee consists of the following 11 members:
As ex officio members:
The Superintendent of the Center; and
The Chairman of the Department of Psychiatry;
3 psychologists;
3 physicians who are licensed to practice medicine in this State and devote a substantial amount of professional time to the practice of psychiatry; and
3 citizens of this State chosen by the Executive Board of the Center from individuals who are interested in and concerned about the care of individuals who have a mental disorder and about research directed toward the prevention, discovery of causes, and treatment of mental disorders and allied conditions.

Of the 3 psychologists and 3 physicians:
1 shall be chosen by the Executive Board of the Center from the University of Maryland School of Medicine;
2 shall be chosen by the Executive Board of the Center from the Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine; and
3 shall be chosen by the Executive Board of the Center from other affiliations, including private practitioners.
